message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $13500.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $12500?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to go down to $13750, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm not sure if we can meet in the middle, but I'm willing to meet you at $12500. This is my final offer, so please let me know if you can accept it
I understand this is your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $12500. I'm willing to meet you at $13250, and that's my final offer.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go no lower than $12000
